languages.text: "Полностью согласна — ашмагов надо держать подальше от хладного торга. А вот с тем, что {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Адептус Механикус{/g} считают дураками всех, кроме себя — не согласна".

"I agree completely — ashmags need to be kept away from the Cold Trade. As for the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}'s conviction that everyone other than themselves is a moron — that I disagree with."
languages.original_text: "Полностью согласна — ашмагов надо держать подальше от хладного торга. А вот с тем, что {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Адептус Механикус{/g} считают дураками всех, кроме себя — не согласна".

traits.locale_text: "I agree completely — ashmags need to be kept away from the Cold Trade. As for the Adeptus Mechanicus's conviction that everyone other than themselves is a moron — that I disagree with."
"I agree completely — ashmags need to be kept away from the Cold Trade. As for the Adeptus Mechanicus's conviction that everyone other than themselves is a moron — that I disagree with."
"I agree completely — ashmags need to be kept away from the Cold Trade. As for the Adeptus Mechanicus's conviction that everyone other than themselves is a moron — that I disagree with."
"I agree completely — ashmags need to be kept away from the Cold Trade. As for the Adeptus Mechanicus's conviction that everyone other than themselves is a moron — that I disagree with."

"I agree completely — ashmags need to be kept away from the Cold Trade. As for the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}'s conviction that everyone other than themselves is a moron — that I disagree with."

languages.text: “我完全同意这一点，普通人应当尽可能远离冷市贸易。至于{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}机械修会{/g}的教条，他们以为这世上除了他们之外的人都是白痴，这一点我并不赞同。”
languages.original_text: "I agree completely — ashmags need to be kept away from the Cold Trade. As for the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}'s conviction that everyone other than themselves is a moron — that I disagree with."

traits.locale_text: “我完全同意这一点，普通人应当尽可能远离冷市贸易。至于{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}机械修会{/g}的教条，他们以为这世上除了他们之外的人都是白痴，这一点我并不赞同。”

languages.text: «Estoy completamente de acuerdo, estos cenutrios deberían estar bien lejos del Comercio Frío. Con lo que no estoy de acuerdo es con la creencia del {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} de que cualquiera que no sea uno de ellos es idiota».
languages.original_text: "I agree completely — ashmags need to be kept away from the Cold Trade. As for the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}'s conviction that everyone other than themselves is a moron — that I disagree with."

traits.locale_text: «Estoy completamente de acuerdo, estos cenutrios deberían estar bien lejos del Comercio Frío. Con lo que no estoy de acuerdo es con la creencia del {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} de que cualquiera que no sea uno de ellos es idiota».

languages.text: 「全くその通りだ…アッシュマグは闇取引から手を引くべきだな。身内以外は低脳という{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}帝国技術局{/g}の信念がある…あたしは同意しかねるけど」
languages.original_text: "I agree completely — ashmags need to be kept away from the Cold Trade. As for the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}'s conviction that everyone other than themselves is a moron — that I disagree with."

traits.locale_text: 「全くその通りだ…アッシュマグは闇取引から手を引くべきだな。身内以外は低脳という{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}帝国技術局{/g}の信念がある…あたしは同意しかねるけど」

languages.text: "Ich bin ganz derselben Meinung – Ashmags müssen vom Kalthandel ferngehalten werden. Aber was die Überzeugung des {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} angeht, dass alle anderen außer sie selbst Idioten sind – diese Meinung teile ich nicht."
languages.original_text: "I agree completely — ashmags need to be kept away from the Cold Trade. As for the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}'s conviction that everyone other than themselves is a moron — that I disagree with."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin ganz derselben Meinung – Ashmags müssen vom Kalthandel ferngehalten werden. Aber was die Überzeugung des {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} angeht, dass alle anderen außer sie selbst Idioten sind – diese Meinung teile ich nicht."

languages.text: « Je suis parfaitement d'accord, le Commerce Froid n'est pas pour les ashmags. Quant à la conviction de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} qu'à part eux, tout le monde est un crétin... Ça par contre, je ne suis pas d'accord. »
languages.original_text: "I agree completely — ashmags need to be kept away from the Cold Trade. As for the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}'s conviction that everyone other than themselves is a moron — that I disagree with."

traits.locale_text: « Je suis parfaitement d'accord, le Commerce Froid n'est pas pour les ashmags. Quant à la conviction de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} qu'à part eux, tout le monde est un crétin... Ça par contre, je ne suis pas d'accord. »

languages.text: "Tümüyle aynı fikirdeyim. Külboğazların Soğuk Takas'a bulaşmaması gerek. {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus'un{/g}, kendileri dışındaki herkesin ahmak olduğuna dair inancına ise katılmıyorum."
languages.original_text: "I agree completely — ashmags need to be kept away from the Cold Trade. As for the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}'s conviction that everyone other than themselves is a moron — that I disagree with."

traits.locale_text: "Tümüyle aynı fikirdeyim. Külboğazların Soğuk Takas'tan uzak durması gerek. {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}'un, kendisi dışındaki herkesin ahmak olduğuna dair inancına ise katılmıyorum."
